title: Riot Points not showing up
body:
Hey guys,
So I got a $25 RP card yesterday and when I entered the code it seemed to have gone through but the lol client was unresponsive. After restarting the client I didn't have the RP so I tried to redeem it again and it said that the code has already been used. I never had issue with redeeming RP before, 
Any thoughts?
Thanks

replies.body:
hiya TheClawwww (holy crap, your name is awesome!), 

If it's been a bit, and you're still not seeing your RP in your account, please submit a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) to Player Support so we can make sure the RP is added.
